definitions.definition: A round object used as an aid for shaping a material, e.g. shaping or enlarging a ring, or bending or enlarging a pipe without creasing or kinking it.
A tool or component of a tool that guides , grips or clamps something, such as a workpiece to be machined, a machining tool or a part while it is moved.

main_definition: A round object used as an aid for shaping a material, e.g. shaping or enlarging a ring, or bending or enlarging a pipe without creasing or kinking it.
secondary_definitions: A tool or component of a tool that guides , grips or clamps something, such as a workpiece to be machined, a machining tool or a part while it is moved.
